code: import React,{useState,useEffect}from'react';import axios from'axios';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";export default function Products(_ref){let{apiBase}=_ref;const[products,setProducts]=useState([]);const[q,setQ]=useState('');useEffect(()=>{load();},[]);async function load(){const res=await axios.get("".concat(apiBase,"/api/products?q="));setProducts(res.data);}async function search(){const res=await axios.get("".concat(apiBase,"/api/products?q=").concat(encodeURIComponent(q)));setProducts(res.data);}return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"box",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{children:"Products"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{style:{marginBottom:8},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{value:q,onChange:e=>setQ(e.target.value),placeholder:"search..."}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:search,style:{marginLeft:8},children:"Search"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:load,style:{marginLeft:8},children:"Load All"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{children:products.map(p=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{style:{borderBottom:'1px solid #eee',padding:'8px 0'},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("strong",{children:p.title})," \u2014 \u20B9",p.price," ",/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("br",{}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("small",{children:[p.category," | SKU: ",p.sku," | Stock: ",p.stock]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{children:p.description})]},p._id))})]});}
